title: LibriVox Short Mystery Story Collection 004
creator: Various
description: LibriVox recording of LibriVox Short Mystery Story Collection 004 (various authors). Librivox’s Short Mystery Story Collection 004: a collection of 10 short works of mysterious fiction in the public domain read by a group of LibriVox members. Read by LibriVox volunteers. For more free audiobooks, or to become a volunteer reader, please visit librivox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; audio book; audiobook; mystery; short story; short stories; collection; detective
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
